title: What are your thoughts on Ariana Grande's new song, 'Rain on Me'? - Quora

response.answer_text: She's really not my thing she's far too sweet and mainstream for me although I hear alot love her and I'm sure she's wonderful just not MY cup of tea TO EACH THEIR OWN I'm more like a Mumford and sons James Blunt Dead Head if you've ever heard of such a thing lol

It’s amazing. The collaboration between Ga Ga and Ariana Grande is literally perfection. It’s a very uplifting song about getting through struggles. And the video is very scientific and beautiful. They fit perfectly. ❤️
